I haven't looked at the OVA and anime introductions of the context of
our i=
ntroduction to Himura the Battousai recently to even gauge
whether historic=
ally one is more accurate than the other.
 
However, I think that because p=
roduction of the animated series was
occurring as Watsuki was still reveali=
ng the later Jinchuu arc and the
events surround Tomoe that the correct con=
tiuity to work from is the
OVA and the manga.  

I'm not sure what your que=
stions are about the Satsuma and Choshu from
your post. Were you trying to =
reconcile errors in the subtitles?  If
it appeared as "Choshi" or "Choshin,=
" it probably should have read
"Choshu," "Choushu," or some permutation of =
those.   

Welcome to the list, btw.  If you need more information on the C=
hoshu,
I can redirect you to a few links (although they are listed at the
m=
ain Shinsengumi page) and communities.
